attributes.action: Recommend  Captain Tom Moore for a knighthood for his charitable fundraising.
attributes.additional_details: Captain Moore has shown to the country how important the NHS are to us in a crisis and his endurance feat typifies his beliefs. His efforts have been appreciated and recognised by his fellow Britons and others who support the NHS.
attributes.background: Recommend  Captain Tom Moore to the Honours Committee for a knighthood for his charitable fundraising for the NHS and to recognise his continuing service to the country.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
